projects.title: NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory
projects.description: Developing planning software for Europa Clipper, a mission launching for Jupiter's moon Europa in 2024.

projects.title: Augmented Perception Lab
projects.description: Exploring sound perception in AR/VR environments, and optimizing visual UI layout based on this perception.

projects.title: UCSF - Statistical Shape Modeling of Knee Menisci
projects.description: Researching the 3D shape of the meniscus and its correlation with incident osteoarthritis. Paper published in Arthritis & Rheumatology.

projects.title: UCSF - Deep Learning and Brain Imaging
projects.description: Using convolutional neural networks to automate the quality control of magnetic resonance spectroscopic imaging (MRSI) voxels. Paper published in Frontiers In Neuroscience.

projects.title: Sandia National Laboratories
projects.description: Modeling gas simulations to optimize the placement of detectors in public facilities.

projects.title: Jazzcats!
projects.description: An iOS game about learning jazz transcription. Yay!!!!!!!!

projects.title: TEDxCMU - Diffraction
projects.description: Main event website for TEDxCMU 2023. Played around with Three.js to develop the home screen gradient + orb interaction.

projects.title: TEDxCMU - I Know A Place
projects.description: Interactive application about sharing stories at locations around CMU. Created for the TEDxCMU 2023 salon event.

projects.title: Music Day
projects.description: Generate background music based on the weather and time of day. Click on the square button to get started and refresh for endless tunes.
